QuestData.Title: The Search for the Hidden Master
QuestData.Description: Oh, hello. Are you looking for the owner of this place? Then look to the pandaren up at the top of the stairs.$b$bI'm just a visitor... like you.$b$bNow if you'll excuse me, my friends and I are trying to decide something. We can talk again afterwards.
QuestData.LogDescription: Listen to Xiao and his companions.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Xiao at Pang's Stead in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Were you listening in? Don't worry, I don't mind. You're welcome to search for the hidden master as well.$b$bThough, if you do find him, I'd appreciate if you came back here and told me where he was.
